synopsis.text:
Papin Island, a tranquil haven in the South Seas, becomes the epicenter of a centuries-old enigma when a group of peculiar, white-haired children arrives in search of an elusive girl. The children, known as 'The Children of Befort,' have been appearing across Europe for over 500 years, their ageless faces and extraordinary abilities baffling all who encounter them. Their quest is guided only by a cryptic image of a crescent moon.

Enter Tohma, a young martial artist residing on Papin Island, who finds himself unwittingly entangled in this timeless mystery. Tohma's life takes a dramatic turn when he befriends Helga, a runaway orphan, and her companion Chitto. As he delves deeper into the mystery surrounding the enigmatic children, he uncovers a startling truth about Helga that will forever alter their destinies.

As the year 2012 unfolds, Tohma's efforts to liberate Helga from the clutches of the orphanage lead him to cross paths with government agents on a hunt for an escaped convict. Amidst this chaos, the centuries-old story of 'The Children of Befort' intertwines with Tohma and Helga's lives, setting the stage for a thrilling adventure that transcends time and space.
